Paul Adeolu Adefarasin (amụrụ n'abalị 25  ọnwa Jenụwarị 1963) bụ Onye Ozi Ndị Kraịst, Onye Ozizi Bible na Televangelist

Ọ bụ Prelate nakwa Metropolitan Senior Pastor nke ụlọ ụka House on the Rock nke isi ya dị na Lagos, (Nigeria) nwere ngalaba n'ọtụtụ obodo dị iche iche na Nigeria gụnyere Port-harcourt, Abuja yana Johannesburg, South Africa & London, UK
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọkọ / onye nnabata nke The Experience (gospel concert).

A mụrụ Paul Adefarasin na 25 Jenụwarị 1963 n'ezinaụlọ Joseph Adefarasin, onye ọka ikpe nke ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke Naijiria si Ijebu Ode, na Hilda Adefarasin, onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị si Lagos Steeti
Wale Adefarasin na Onyeozi Yemi Adefarasin, ha abụọ bụ ndị ozi Ndị Kraịst a na-akwanyere ùgwù. A zụlitere ya na Nigeria na United States.
Adefarasin gara ụlọ akwụkwọ St Saviour dị na Ikoyi, na Igbobi College na Yaba
Agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya bụ na Haileybury College na England. Ọ gara n'ihu gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Miami, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Architecture
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Florida tupu ọ laghachi Naịjirịa.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na International Bible Institute of London ebe ọ nwetara diplọma na Christian Ministry.
Adefarasin edeela, ma bipụta n'onwe ya ihe karịrị obere akwụkwọ iri abụọ na-akpali akpali nke Ndị Kraịst na ihe onwunwe multimedia
Ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na ndị na-ekesa akwụkwọ Ndị Kraịst ebipụtala atọ n'ime akwụkwọ ya.

N'ọnwa June 1995, Adefarasin lụrụ Ifeanyi Adefarasin (amụrụ na Septemba 16th 1972), onye bụbu eze nwanyị mara mma ma ugbu a bụ onye ozi a na-akwanyere ùgwù na onye na-ekwu okwu ọgbakọ a maara nke ọma maka ozi doro anya na nke bara uru nke olileanya na ike. Ha mụrụ ụmụ atọ.
